com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget
Class WPListPicker

java.lang.Object
  LinearLayout
      com.tombarrasso.android.wp7ui.widget.WPListPicker
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class WPListPicker
extends LinearLayout

Note: this View is scheduled to be completly remade, so it is not recommended for use in future projects.
Use a LinearLayout and hide/ show children as needed instead. A simple drop down list with a list of strings.

Utilizing a hidden AutoCompleteTextView android.widget.AutoCompleteTextView and a WPTextView WPTextView a list of options is present for the user to choose an option from a drop down list without presenting a dialog box.

Since:
2012

Deprecated. 
Returns:
The current text selected by the user, or "None" if no option has been choosen.

toggleDropDown

public void toggleDropDown()
Deprecated. 
Toggle the drop down list. If the drop down list is visible, hide it. If it is hidden, make it visible.
